item.text: Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

cdata.text: This resolution (1) condemns certain statements made by Representative Rashida Tlaib, (2) condemns Members of Congress who advocate for anti-Semitic policies, and (3) reaffirms the commitment of the House of Representatives to support and defend the Constitution.

bill.title: Condemning the statements of Representative Rashida Tlaib of Michigan.

item.title: Condemning the statements of Representative Rashida Tlaib of Michigan.
Condemning the statements of Representative Rashida Tlaib of Michigan.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
